alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Loudoun (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued September 09 at 5:51PM EDT until September 09 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 677 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MARYLAND ANNE ARUNDEL HOWARD MONTGOMERY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND CARROLL FREDERICK WASHINGTON IN NORTHEAST MARYLAND CECIL IN NORTHERN MARYLAND BALTIMORE BALTIMORE CITY HARFORD IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN VIRGINIA LOUDOUN IN NORTHWEST VIRGINIA CLARKE IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN PANHANDLE WEST VIRGINIA BERKELEY JEFFERSON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABERDEEN, ANNAPOLIS, ARNOLD, ASPEN HILL, BALLENGER CREEK, BALTIMORE, BEL AIR, BERRYVILLE, BETHESDA, CATONSVILLE, CHARLES TOWN, COLUMBIA, DUNDALK, EDGEWOOD, ELDERSBURG, ELKTON, ELLICOTT CITY, ESSEX, FALLSTON, FREDERICK, GAITHERSBURG, GERMANTOWN, GLEN BURNIE, HAGERSTOWN, HAVRE DE GRACE, JOPPATOWNE, LEESBURG, MARTINSBURG, ODENTON, PARKVILLE, PIKESVILLE, POTOMAC, RANDALLSTOWN, ROCKVILLE, SEVERN, SEVERNA PARK, SHEPHERDSTOWN, SILVER SPRING, SOUTH GATE, STERLING, TOWSON, AND WESTMINSTER.
